short_summary: Contractors and suppliers can request to be placed on a List for prospective projects in Manitoba from April 1st, 2023 to March 31, 2026
description: The contractor on the List who secures a contract has to provide an effective warranty and collaborate closely with suppliers to meet necessary requirements.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for BFC Shilo - Open Construction Source List**

**Reference Number:** MX-22639806279
**Solicitation Number:** WO23SLSL

**Tender Status:** Open

**Publication Date:** December 19, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** March 31, 2026

**Description:**  
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is inviting contractors and suppliers to apply for inclusion in an Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work required by the Department of National Defence at CFB Shilo for the fiscal years 2023-2024, 2024-2025, and 2025-2026.

**Eligibility Criteria:**  
Eligible contractors and suppliers must meet the requirements for the OCSL. Interested applicants are advised to submit their applications as soon as possible, preferably by January 30, 2023. A response to this invitation is required to participate in the list.

**Benefits:**  
Successful applicants will be invited to bid on construction services opportunities with an estimated value of $10 million and below. The OCSL will be used to tender construction services, and Contractors and suppliers will be invited electronically through MERX.

**Security Requirements:**  
All contracts under this OCSL may contain organization and personnel security requirements. Applicants must actively hold the required security clearance(s) at the time of closing, as detailed in the solicitation/tender documents.

**Terms and Conditions:**  
By submitting a response to this invitation, contractors and suppliers consent to the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation/tender document.

**Applicant Informaton:**  
The contract is managed by Defence Construction Canada - Western Region. The contact person is Justin Bennett, who can be reached at justin.bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or 819-962-2917.

**Attachments:**
There is no additional information provided in the attachments.

**Tender Documents:**
Tender documents and information related to this tender can be accessed through MERX (http://www.merx.com). Preferred official language for the required documents must be indicated at the time of the request to be placed on the list.
